name: Classic Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese in a toasted bun.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy spaghetti with pancetta, parmesan, and a hint of garlic.

name: Sushi Platter
description: A variety of fresh sushi including nigiri, maki, and sashimi.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan tossed in Caesar dressing.

name: Tomato Soup
description: A rich and creamy tomato soup with a touch of basil.

name: Chicken Tacos
description: Soft tacos filled with seasoned chicken, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato sauce.

name: Miso Ramen
description: A savory Japanese noodle soup with miso broth, pork, and vegetables.

name: Grilled Steak
description: A succulent grilled steak served with a side of mashed potatoes.

name: Pork Dumplings
description: Steamed dumplings filled with seasoned pork and vegetables.

name: Seafood Paella
description: A Spanish dish with rice, seafood, saffron, and a variety of spices.

name: Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Creamy vanilla ice cream topped with a drizzle of chocolate syrup.

name: Beef Burrito
description: A large tortilla filled with seasoned beef, beans, rice, and cheese.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, peanuts, egg, and a tangy sauce.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and moist chocolate cake topped with chocolate ganache.
